projects.title: Intelligent Personal Assistant Robot
projects.description: A robotic assistant system featuring maze exploration, navigation simulation, and intelligent pathfinding algorithms.
features: Designed system architecture for intelligent assistant robot
Developed maze exploration algorithm using Python and Flask
Implemented simulation for navigation with C# and Unity Game Engine
Applied backtracking technique optimized with dynamic programming for maze solving

projects.title: Professional Email Service API
projects.description: A clean, secure, and production-ready Node.js and Express.js REST API for sending emails via Gmail SMTP.
features: Modular clean architecture with separation of concerns across controllers, services, routes, and middleware
Gmail SMTP integration with full support for multiple recipients (TO, CC, BCC)
Robust input validation and sanitization using Express-Validator
Security enhancements via Helmet, CORS configuration, rate limiting, and environment-based settings
Health check endpoints for service monitoring and SMTP status verification
Comprehensive test coverage including validation, error handling, and endpoint tests
Production-ready deployment with logging, error handling, and compatibility with platforms like Render or Heroku
